subject: [Radiance-general] X 11 trouble with OS X
body:
I hope it doesn't sound too condescending, but do you have X11
installed? I used "fink" to install a variety of Unix-like tools,
and it installs X11 in the process.

Mark

On Wed, 20 Feb 2008, Dave Bosworth wrote:
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] X 11 trouble with OS X
